meanings: the very thing[person] wanted, the right thing[person], just the thing[person]

vlive.korean: 마침 또 마피아끼리는 서로... 마피아끼리는 서로 알았어요? Mafias...Did you know each other? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
마침 딱! And in a timely manner! 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
마침 저기 오네! They're here just in time! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 한 번 진상은 영원한 진상이다 [가두리횟집] EP06
근데 마침 또 파자마 입어달라는... They just asked us to wear pajamas. 듣기 View video WINNER : 💥김송이💥
vlive.english: They just asked us to wear pajamas.

vlive.korean: 여러분들한테 인사를 드릴 수 있을 거 같아서 시간이 마침... so I have some time to say hello to you. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 온라인 카페 데이트 🐶🐢
vlive.english: so I have some time to say hello to you.

examples.korean: The ambulance got there just in time. 발음듣기 구급차가 거기에 마침 늦지 않게 도착했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ambulance got there just in time. 발음

examples.korean: She happened to be out when we called. 발음듣기 우리가 갔을 때 그녀는 마침 외출 중이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She happened to be out when we called. 발음

examples.korean: It happened that she was out when we called. 발음듣기 마침 공교롭게도 우리가 갔을 때 그녀는 외출 중이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It happened that she was out when we called. 발음

examples.korean: As it happens, I have a spare set of keys in my office. 발음듣기 마침, 내 사무실에 여분의 열쇠가 한 벌 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As it happens, I have a spare set of keys in my office. 발음

examples.korean: His success was down to being in the right place at the right time. 발음듣기 그의 성공은 마침 때 맞춰 찾아 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His success was down to being in the right place at the right time. 발음
